page.title: 17ASHFORD PARISH CHURCH
page.content: The Parish Church stands in the centre of the village and is open every day for prayer and visitors.On Sunday there is the Parish Communion at 10 o'clock which is well attended by people of all ages _ grannies of nearly 90 and small babies.We meet after the Service for coffee are happy that newcomers find our church a warm and welcoming place.The also comment on its cleanliness and beautiful kneelers. Baptisms take place during the Sunday Service and from time to time there are weddings and funerals. Many people appreciate the bookstall which guides of the building and of the parishes of Ashford Sheldon. The bells ring every Sunday to welcome us to the Altar.Our Church is truly alive in 1985.
